content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":257752,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふむ・・でも、あいつバカだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm... But, that guy is stupid."},{"lineNumber":257753,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうか・・よし、いい方法を思いついたぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"I see... Alright, I've come up with a good idea."},{"lineNumber":257754,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオスが復活して戻って来た、パワーアップしたぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos has been resurrected and returned, powered up."},{"lineNumber":257755,"originalJapaneseLine":"（対魔人に強力なスーパーカオスカード：ホールド技）","translatedEnglishLine":"(A powerful super Chaos card against demon lords: Hold technique)"},{"lineNumber":257756,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスは別室でレッドアイ対策を考える","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance thinks about countermeasures for Red Eye in a separate room."},{"lineNumber":257757,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tより強い奴に寄生する存在か・・名案を思いつく","translatedEnglishLine":"It is a being that parasitizes something stronger... I've come up with a brilliant idea."},{"lineNumber":257758,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tカオスがパワーアップして戻ってきた","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos has powered up and returned."},{"lineNumber":257759,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人レッドアイと接触","translatedEnglishLine":"Contact with the demon lord Red Eye."},{"lineNumber":257760,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t人類最強の男ロッキーだ、こいつに乗り移れ作戦、だが失敗","translatedEnglishLine":"He's Rocky, the strongest man in humanity; an operation to possess him—but it failed."},{"lineNumber":257761,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t正攻法で戦う","translatedEnglishLine":"Fighting by straightforward methods."},{"lineNumber":257762,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversation during battle."},{"lineNumber":257763,"originalJapaneseLine":"闘神ゼータ、パットンが援軍に現れる","translatedEnglishLine":"The War God Zeta and Patton appear as reinforcements."},{"lineNumber":257764,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversation during battle."},{"lineNumber":257765,"originalJapaneseLine":"闘神ゼータが魔人レッドアイを押さえつけ","translatedEnglishLine":"War God Zeta restrains the demon lord Red Eye."},{"lineNumber":257766,"originalJapaneseLine":"行動を制限させる","translatedEnglishLine":"Restricting his actions."},{"lineNumber":257767,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversation during battle."},{"lineNumber":257768,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんとかトッポスにまとわりついて動きを止めていたゼータ","translatedEnglishLine":"Zeta somehow clung to Toppos and stopped his movement."},{"lineNumber":257769,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、ついにトッポスに突き飛ばされてしまう。","translatedEnglishLine":"But in the end, he was shoved away by Toppos."},{"lineNumber":257770,"originalJapaneseLine":"パットン　ランス、あいつを止めておくのはもう無理だぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Patton: Lance, it's no longer possible to stop that guy."},{"lineNumber":257771,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス　　おーけ、よくここまで持たせてくれた、後は任せろ","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance: Okay, you held him off well this far. Leave the rest to me."},{"lineNumber":257772,"originalJapaneseLine":"トッポスは身体はコキコキさして、自由になった、よし殴るぞという感じ","translatedEnglishLine":"Toppos cracked his body and freed himself—alright, he's ready to strike."},{"lineNumber":257773,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人レッドアイを倒した","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon lord Red Eye was defeated."},{"lineNumber":257774,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tレッドアイは今度はランスに寄生しようとしたが","translatedEnglishLine":"Red Eye tried to parasitize Lance this time, but..."},{"lineNumber":257775,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tビスケッタさんが撃墜、魔血魂を回収","translatedEnglishLine":"Biscetta shot him down and recovered the demonic blood soul."},{"lineNumber":257776,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人を倒したのに魔軍の勢いは止まらない","translatedEnglishLine":"Although the demon lord was defeated, the momentum of the demon army does not stop."},{"lineNumber":257777,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス城に迫ってきている","translatedEnglishLine":"They are approaching Lance Castle."},{"lineNumber":257778,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス城は魔軍に包囲され陥落寸前になるが","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance Castle is surrounded by the demon army and is on the verge of falling, but..."},{"lineNumber":257779,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tシーラが戻っており聖魔教団の遺産を発動させる準備をしていた","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheila had returned and was preparing to activate the Holy Demon Cult's legacy."},{"lineNumber":257780,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔軍が迫ってくる寸前、地響きをあげランス城は浮上した","translatedEnglishLine":"Just before the demon army could approach, with a rumble the Lance Castle lifted."},{"lineNumber":257781,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\"ＣＧ：ランス城飛ぶ\"","translatedEnglishLine":"\"CG: Lance Castle flies\""},{"lineNumber":257782,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人レッドアイを倒した","translatedEnglishLine":"Defeated the demon lord Red Eye."},{"lineNumber":257783,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tサテラが止めをさして魔血魂を回収","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera dealt the finishing blow and recovered the demonic blood soul."},{"lineNumber":257784,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス城で戦局を聞く","translatedEnglishLine":"Listening to the war situation at Lance Castle."},{"lineNumber":257785,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人を倒したのに魔軍は引く気配が無い","translatedEnglishLine":"Although the demon lord was defeated, the demon army shows no sign of retreat."},{"lineNumber":257786,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t戦局は変えれなかった撤退しか無いかという時","translatedEnglishLine":"When it seemed they couldn't change the battle situation and could only retreat..."},{"lineNumber":257787,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tパットンとシーラが現れる","translatedEnglishLine":"Patton and Sheila appeared."},{"lineNumber":257788,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tパットンは聖魔教団の遺産を使って","translatedEnglishLine":"Patton uses the Holy Demon Cult's legacy."},{"lineNumber":257789,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス城を空に飛ばすという","translatedEnglishLine":"To make Lance Castle fly into the sky."},{"lineNumber":257790,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tそれまで時間を稼いで欲しい","translatedEnglishLine":"They want to buy time until then."},{"lineNumber":257791,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔軍がランス城に殺到しようとした時","translatedEnglishLine":"When the demon army tried to swarm Lance Castle,"},{"lineNumber":257792,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t大きな地響きを上げランス城を浮上した","translatedEnglishLine":"With a large rumble, Lance Castle floated up."},{"lineNumber":257793,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\"ＣＧ：ランス城飛ぶ\"","translatedEnglishLine":"\"CG: Lance Castle flies\""},{"lineNumber":257794,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t空中に飛んでいるランス城","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance Castle flying in the air."},{"lineNumber":257795,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t地表に魔軍の大軍が集まっているが攻撃出来ないでいる","translatedEnglishLine":"A large demon army gathers on the ground but cannot attack."},{"lineNumber":257796,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t安全だと安心していると、飛行する魔物兵が襲ってきた","translatedEnglishLine":"While feeling safe, flying demon soldiers attacked."},{"lineNumber":257797,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t飛行魔物兵の数は少なく迎撃に成功","translatedEnglishLine":"The number of flying demon soldiers was small, and the interception was successful."},{"lineNumber":257798,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t闘神ゼータはランス城(闘神都市)になっており動けない","translatedEnglishLine":"War God Zeta has become Lance Castle (War God City) and cannot move."},{"lineNumber":257799,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス城は浮かんでいるだけで移動出来ない事を知る","translatedEnglishLine":"They realize Lance Castle is just floating and cannot move."},{"lineNumber":257800,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこの城は安全なだけで状況は詰んでいる","translatedEnglishLine":"This castle is only safe, but the situation is hopeless."},{"lineNumber":257801,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこの世界に起きる１０年に一度の事件","translatedEnglishLine":"An incident that occurs once every ten years in this world."},{"lineNumber":257802,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t満ち潮、大陸の周辺に海が発生した","translatedEnglishLine":"The high tide created seas around the continent."},{"lineNumber":257803,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\"ＣＧ：２０海里\"","translatedEnglishLine":"\"CG: 20 nautical miles\""},{"lineNumber":257804,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t１０年に一度の満ち潮は消えていった","translatedEnglishLine":"The once-a-decade high tide disappeared."},{"lineNumber":257805,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\"ＣＧ：２０海里\"","translatedEnglishLine":"\"CG: 20 nautical miles\""},{"lineNumber":257806,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、とある村","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, in a certain village."},{"lineNumber":257807,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t引退した勇者テオマンが幸せに過ごしていたが","translatedEnglishLine":"Retired hero Teoman was spending his days happily, but..."},{"lineNumber":257808,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔物に攻め込まれ恋人も殺されてしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"Monsters attacked, and his lover was killed."},{"lineNumber":257809,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t聖女セラクロラスの力を借りて勇者に復帰","translatedEnglishLine":"He returned to being a hero with the help of the saintess Seracloras' power."},{"lineNumber":257810,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t今度は非情に徹した勇者になると誓う","translatedEnglishLine":"He swore to become a hero who is utterly ruthless this time."},{"lineNumber":257811,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t戦場を見下ろす丘","translatedEnglishLine":"A hill overlooking the battlefield."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふむ・・でも、あいつバカだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... But, that guy is stupid.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか・・よし、いい方法を思いついたぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see... Alright, I've come up with a good idea.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスが復活して戻って来た、パワーアップしたぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos has been resurrected and returned, powered up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （対魔人に強力なスーパーカオスカード：ホールド技）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (A powerful super Chaos card against demon lords: Hold technique)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは別室でレッドアイ対策を考える
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance thinks about countermeasures for Red Eye in a separate room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: より強い奴に寄生する存在か・・名案を思いつく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is a being that parasitizes something stronger... I've come up with a brilliant idea.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスがパワーアップして戻ってきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos has powered up and returned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レッドアイと接触
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Contact with the demon lord Red Eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類最強の男ロッキーだ、こいつに乗り移れ作戦、だが失敗
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's Rocky, the strongest man in humanity; an operation to possess him—but it failed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正攻法で戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fighting by straightforward methods.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation during battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神ゼータ、パットンが援軍に現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The War God Zeta and Patton appear as reinforcements.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation during battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神ゼータが魔人レッドアイを押さえつけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: War God Zeta restrains the demon lord Red Eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行動を制限させる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Restricting his actions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation during battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとかトッポスにまとわりついて動きを止めていたゼータ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeta somehow clung to Toppos and stopped his movement.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、ついにトッポスに突き飛ばされてしまう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But in the end, he was shoved away by Toppos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パットン　ランス、あいつを止めておくのはもう無理だぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton: Lance, it's no longer possible to stop that guy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス　　おーけ、よくここまで持たせてくれた、後は任せろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance: Okay, you held him off well this far. Leave the rest to me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トッポスは身体はコキコキさして、自由になった、よし殴るぞという感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Toppos cracked his body and freed himself—alright, he's ready to strike.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レッドアイを倒した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon lord Red Eye was defeated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レッドアイは今度はランスに寄生しようとしたが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Red Eye tried to parasitize Lance this time, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさんが撃墜、魔血魂を回収
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta shot him down and recovered the demonic blood soul.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人を倒したのに魔軍の勢いは止まらない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Although the demon lord was defeated, the momentum of the demon army does not stop.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城に迫ってきている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are approaching Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城は魔軍に包囲され陥落寸前になるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance Castle is surrounded by the demon army and is on the verge of falling, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラが戻っており聖魔教団の遺産を発動させる準備をしていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheila had returned and was preparing to activate the Holy Demon Cult's legacy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍が迫ってくる寸前、地響きをあげランス城は浮上した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just before the demon army could approach, with a rumble the Lance Castle lifted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: "ＣＧ：ランス城飛ぶ"
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "CG: Lance Castle flies"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レッドアイを倒した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeated the demon lord Red Eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラが止めをさして魔血魂を回収
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera dealt the finishing blow and recovered the demonic blood soul.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城で戦局を聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Listening to the war situation at Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人を倒したのに魔軍は引く気配が無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Although the demon lord was defeated, the demon army shows no sign of retreat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦局は変えれなかった撤退しか無いかという時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When it seemed they couldn't change the battle situation and could only retreat...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パットンとシーラが現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton and Sheila appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パットンは聖魔教団の遺産を使って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton uses the Holy Demon Cult's legacy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城を空に飛ばすという
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To make Lance Castle fly into the sky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それまで時間を稼いで欲しい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They want to buy time until then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍がランス城に殺到しようとした時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When the demon army tried to swarm Lance Castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大きな地響きを上げランス城を浮上した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a large rumble, Lance Castle floated up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: "ＣＧ：ランス城飛ぶ"
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "CG: Lance Castle flies"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空中に飛んでいるランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance Castle flying in the air.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地表に魔軍の大軍が集まっているが攻撃出来ないでいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A large demon army gathers on the ground but cannot attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 安全だと安心していると、飛行する魔物兵が襲ってきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While feeling safe, flying demon soldiers attacked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 飛行魔物兵の数は少なく迎撃に成功
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The number of flying demon soldiers was small, and the interception was successful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神ゼータはランス城(闘神都市)になっており動けない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: War God Zeta has become Lance Castle (War God City) and cannot move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城は浮かんでいるだけで移動出来ない事を知る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They realize Lance Castle is just floating and cannot move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この城は安全なだけで状況は詰んでいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This castle is only safe, but the situation is hopeless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界に起きる１０年に一度の事件
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An incident that occurs once every ten years in this world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 満ち潮、大陸の周辺に海が発生した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The high tide created seas around the continent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: "ＣＧ：２０海里"
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "CG: 20 nautical miles"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １０年に一度の満ち潮は消えていった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The once-a-decade high tide disappeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: "ＣＧ：２０海里"
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "CG: 20 nautical miles"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、とある村
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, in a certain village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 引退した勇者テオマンが幸せに過ごしていたが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Retired hero Teoman was spending his days happily, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物に攻め込まれ恋人も殺されてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monsters attacked, and his lover was killed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聖女セラクロラスの力を借りて勇者に復帰
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He returned to being a hero with the help of the saintess Seracloras' power.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今度は非情に徹した勇者になると誓う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He swore to become a hero who is utterly ruthless this time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場を見下ろす丘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A hill overlooking the battlefield.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふむ・・でも、あいつバカだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... But, that guy is stupid.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか・・よし、いい方法を思いついたぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see... Alright, I've come up with a good idea.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスが復活して戻って来た、パワーアップしたぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos has been resurrected and returned, powered up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （対魔人に強力なスーパーカオスカード：ホールド技）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (A powerful super Chaos card against demon lords: Hold technique)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは別室でレッドアイ対策を考える
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance thinks about countermeasures for Red Eye in a separate room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: より強い奴に寄生する存在か・・名案を思いつく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is a being that parasitizes something stronger... I've come up with a brilliant idea.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスがパワーアップして戻ってきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos has powered up and returned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レッドアイと接触
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Contact with the demon lord Red Eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類最強の男ロッキーだ、こいつに乗り移れ作戦、だが失敗
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's Rocky, the strongest man in humanity; an operation to possess him—but it failed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正攻法で戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fighting by straightforward methods.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation during battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神ゼータ、パットンが援軍に現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The War God Zeta and Patton appear as reinforcements.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation during battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神ゼータが魔人レッドアイを押さえつけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: War God Zeta restrains the demon lord Red Eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行動を制限させる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Restricting his actions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation during battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとかトッポスにまとわりついて動きを止めていたゼータ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeta somehow clung to Toppos and stopped his movement.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、ついにトッポスに突き飛ばされてしまう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But in the end, he was shoved away by Toppos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パットン　ランス、あいつを止めておくのはもう無理だぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton: Lance, it's no longer possible to stop that guy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス　　おーけ、よくここまで持たせてくれた、後は任せろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance: Okay, you held him off well this far. Leave the rest to me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トッポスは身体はコキコキさして、自由になった、よし殴るぞという感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Toppos cracked his body and freed himself—alright, he's ready to strike.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レッドアイを倒した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon lord Red Eye was defeated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レッドアイは今度はランスに寄生しようとしたが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Red Eye tried to parasitize Lance this time, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさんが撃墜、魔血魂を回収
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta shot him down and recovered the demonic blood soul.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人を倒したのに魔軍の勢いは止まらない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Although the demon lord was defeated, the momentum of the demon army does not stop.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城に迫ってきている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are approaching Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城は魔軍に包囲され陥落寸前になるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance Castle is surrounded by the demon army and is on the verge of falling, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラが戻っており聖魔教団の遺産を発動させる準備をしていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheila had returned and was preparing to activate the Holy Demon Cult's legacy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍が迫ってくる寸前、地響きをあげランス城は浮上した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just before the demon army could approach, with a rumble the Lance Castle lifted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: "ＣＧ：ランス城飛ぶ"
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "CG: Lance Castle flies"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レッドアイを倒した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeated the demon lord Red Eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラが止めをさして魔血魂を回収
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera dealt the finishing blow and recovered the demonic blood soul.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城で戦局を聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Listening to the war situation at Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人を倒したのに魔軍は引く気配が無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Although the demon lord was defeated, the demon army shows no sign of retreat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦局は変えれなかった撤退しか無いかという時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When it seemed they couldn't change the battle situation and could only retreat...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パットンとシーラが現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton and Sheila appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パットンは聖魔教団の遺産を使って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton uses the Holy Demon Cult's legacy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城を空に飛ばすという
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To make Lance Castle fly into the sky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それまで時間を稼いで欲しい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They want to buy time until then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍がランス城に殺到しようとした時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When the demon army tried to swarm Lance Castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大きな地響きを上げランス城を浮上した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a large rumble, Lance Castle floated up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: "ＣＧ：ランス城飛ぶ"
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "CG: Lance Castle flies"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空中に飛んでいるランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance Castle flying in the air.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地表に魔軍の大軍が集まっているが攻撃出来ないでいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A large demon army gathers on the ground but cannot attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 安全だと安心していると、飛行する魔物兵が襲ってきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While feeling safe, flying demon soldiers attacked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 飛行魔物兵の数は少なく迎撃に成功
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The number of flying demon soldiers was small, and the interception was successful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神ゼータはランス城(闘神都市)になっており動けない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: War God Zeta has become Lance Castle (War God City) and cannot move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城は浮かんでいるだけで移動出来ない事を知る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They realize Lance Castle is just floating and cannot move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この城は安全なだけで状況は詰んでいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This castle is only safe, but the situation is hopeless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界に起きる１０年に一度の事件
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An incident that occurs once every ten years in this world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 満ち潮、大陸の周辺に海が発生した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The high tide created seas around the continent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: "ＣＧ：２０海里"
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "CG: 20 nautical miles"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １０年に一度の満ち潮は消えていった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The once-a-decade high tide disappeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: "ＣＧ：２０海里"
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "CG: 20 nautical miles"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、とある村
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, in a certain village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 引退した勇者テオマンが幸せに過ごしていたが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Retired hero Teoman was spending his days happily, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物に攻め込まれ恋人も殺されてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monsters attacked, and his lover was killed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聖女セラクロラスの力を借りて勇者に復帰
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He returned to being a hero with the help of the saintess Seracloras' power.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今度は非情に徹した勇者になると誓う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He swore to become a hero who is utterly ruthless this time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場を見下ろす丘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A hill overlooking the battlefield.
